text: Mundi is a village in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located from Kapurthala, which is both district and sub-district headquarters of Mundi. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch, who is an elected representative. == Demography == According to the report published by Census India in 2011, Mundi has total number of 261 houses and population of 1,377 of which include 707 males and 670 females. Literacy rate of Mundi is 59.29%, lower than state average of 75.84%. The population of children under the age of 6 years is 188 which is 13.65% of total population of Mundi, and child sex ratio is approximately 790, lower than state average of 846. == Population data == {|class="wikitable sortable" !
